gw.plugin.policyhold

Interface IPolicyHoldJobEvalPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IPolicyHoldJobEvalPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Plugin to evaluate jobs against the policy holds blocking them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildQueryForJobsToEvaluate(IQueryBuilder<PolicyHoldJob> query)
      Enhances provided query to find jobs that need to be evaluated against the policy holds blocking them.
      void evaluate(PolicyHoldJob policyHoldJob)
      Evaluates a job against a policy hold.

    • Method Detail

      • buildQueryForJobsToEvaluate

        void buildQueryForJobsToEvaluate(IQueryBuilder<PolicyHoldJob> query)
        Enhances provided query to find jobs that need to be evaluated against the policy holds blocking them. The results are represented as a PolicyHoldJob, which contain the job, the policy hold blocking the job, and the last time the job was evaluated against the policy hold.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to be enhanced

      • evaluate

        void evaluate(PolicyHoldJob policyHoldJob)
        Evaluates a job against a policy hold. Implementations may then take further actions like, creating activities or processing jobs.
        Parameters:
        policyHoldJob - the PolicyHoldJob to evaluate.
